about_the_game:
Enhance your experience within the Exhale XR app with this VR immersion from the Exhale wellness library.

Experience Details
A lovely bubblegum sky at sunrise begins this immersion's path. Seated on a bench overlooking the inner coastal waters as the world begins to wake up around you. Next you are taken to the perfect ocean island pond. Take time to reflect as the waters gently glide beyond the green grass blades behind you. Ending your immersion, you find yourself at the ocean's edge with an old pier off in the distance. Dive deeper into your meditation as the waves rock in and out at your feet.

Purpose
Relaxation
Mindfulness
Self meditation

Length
10:29

Specs
360° video
3840x2160
29.97fps
.mp4 file type

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5 2nd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidea GTX 1060 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3rd gen equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVideo GTX 2070 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
